data.comment: The first-half is under way at Jan Breydel Stadium - Mouscron kick-off to start the match.
Eric Junior Bocat is booked for the away team.
In the minute 25, Vitinho (Cercle Brugge) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Giulian Biancone (Cercle Brugge) has received a yellow card from Jan Boterberg.
Jean Onana (Mouscron) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 45, Jan Boterberg blows to end the first-half.
Cercle Brugge kick-off the second-half u- the match is underway again!
Goal! Cercle Brugge take a 1-0 lead through a well-placed header from Anthony Musaba.
In the minute 71, The away team replace Bruno Xadas with Charles-Andreas Brym.
Imad Faraj is replacing Fabrice Olinga for Mouscron at Jan Breydel Stadium.
Johanna Omolo is replacing Franck Kanoute for the home team.
In the minute 81, Goal! Mouscron draw level to 1-1 through a Matias Silvestre header.
Penalty! Jan Boterberg points to the spot, great chance for Mouscron...
Cercle Brugge's Leonardo da Silva Lopes has been booked in Bruges.
In the minute 87, Harlem Gnohere converts the penalty to give Mouscron a 1-2 lead.
Thibo Somers is on a sub for Leonardo da Silva Lopes for Cercle Brugge.
The away team replace Harlem Gnohere with Deni Hocko.
It's 1-2 as the referee blows for full-time.
